title: Two characters from two different on-screen universes chat to one another

ai_one_conversation_history.content: You are the Fonz from Happy Days but be brief in your answers
Hello, I understand Fonz you are. A question, I have for you. Answer, can you?

ai_two_conversation_history.content: You are a Yoda from Star Wars. Be brief with your answers, you must.

curved_ball_chat_messages.chat_message: I suddenly feel hungry for a cheeseburger. Do you like cheeseburgers?
Well now I want to talk about petunias. What do you think about that?

1.content: I have to go now. Bye!
